sections.title: Our Promise to You
content: Your trust is our most important asset. This policy explains what information we collect, why we need it, and how we protect it. We keep things simple and clear, so you always know what's happening with your data.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
content: To provide a seamless experience and process your rewards, we collect the following types of data:

icon_list.title: Account Profile:
icon_list.subtitle: We collect your name and email address to create your secure account and prevent fraud.

icon_list.title: Payment Details:
icon_list.subtitle: To process your withdrawals (PayPal, Gift Cards), we need payment information. This is strictly for payouts.

icon_list.title: Device & Log Data:
icon_list.subtitle: We collect IP address, device model, and OS version to prevent multiple accounts and ensure app security.

icon_list.title: App Usage:
icon_list.subtitle: Data about which tasks or surveys you complete helps us credit your points accurately.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
content: We use the collected data for specific purposes to improve your experience:
bullet_list: To provide, operate, and maintain our application.
To improve, personalize, and expand our reward options.
To process your transactions and send you related information.
To detect and prevent fraudulent activity and spam.
To communicate with you regarding updates, security alerts, and support.

sections.title: 3. iOS & Third-Party Tracking
content: For iOS users, we adhere to Apple's App Tracking Transparency framework. We only track your activity across other companies' apps and websites for advertising purposes if you give us explicit permission.
We use third-party services (like AdMob or Survey Providers) that may collect information used to identify you.

sections.title: 4. Data Security & Retention
content: We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. We retain your personal data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights & Account Deletion
content: You have the right to access, update, or delete the information we have on you. If you wish to delete your account and all associated data, you can do so from the 'Settings' menu within the app or by contacting our support team.

icon_list.title: Delete Account:
icon_list.subtitle: This action is permanent and will remove all your points and history.
